name: Getting Out
description:
I went onto the game idea generator by Orteil, and I got "An artsy game where you roll around you're subconscious and learn a thing or two along the way." Afterwards I started development on a scrapped project. A touching experience with cleaning bots, milk cartons in refrigerators, and the meaning of life itself... sort of.

P.S: The game is free, although I really want to save up enough to purchase a unity pro license someday; donate to help me with saving for unity pro and college.
